metadata.description: Letter from Acting Post-Office Inspector Benedicto Cunanan to Secretary of National Defense and Communications Major General Basilio Valdes regarding the advertising of the first day of sale of the regular Victory Stamps Liberated Philippines on January 17, 1945
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; World War II; Leyte; official papers; letters; Secretary of National Defense and Communications
metadata.title: Letter from Acting Post-Office Inspector Benedicto Cunanan to Secretary of National Defense and Communications Major General Basilio Valdes regarding the advertising of the first day of sale of the new Victory Postage Stamps
